name: Nebula Run
description:
Info:
In this game, you play as a comet that races through a nebula. Make sure to avoid all obstacles in your path in order to achieve a high score!

Features:
- "Classic" mode where the goal of the game is to avoid touching all light particles that stand in your path. 
- "Easy", "Normal", and "Hard" difficulty levels.
- "Hi-Score" menu where players can keep track of all previously attained high scores.
- Adjust the music track to any song within the game's internal library.

How to play:
Move Left: Touch and hold the left-hand side of the screen to move towards the left.
Move Right: Touch and hold the right-hand side of the screen to move towards the right.

News (3/15/20):
Currently only the "Classic" mode is available. "Limit" mode is currently in development which will then be followed by "Freedom" mode.
